p: Vero cells were infected with DENV-2, RSV, hPIV-3, ZIKV and WNV at an MOI 1 for 2 h, after which virus was removed, and fresh medium containing 2% fetal bovine serum (FBS) containing the indicated concentration (0.01, 0.04, 0.16, 0.63, 1.25, 2.5, 10, 20, 50 Î¼M) of RK-33 or equivalent volume of the vehicle DMSO. Culture medium was collected 22 h later and viral titres determined by plaque assay or RT-qPCR.
